parameters.name: Force
parameters.description: Specifies whether to force bind a domain name to the instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud DNS instance.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language in which you want the values of some response parameters to be returned. These response parameters support multiple languages.

parameters.name: NewDomain
parameters.description: The domain name that you want to bind to the instance. If you do not specify this parameter, this operation unbinds the original domain name from the instance.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.
